channel.title: Rewriting a server in Jruby/Jpython
channel.description: Ok i might be attempting this. Basicly i want to re-write a private server in eather A. Jruby or B. Jpython. They are both fairly easy languages too learn( i know them both.) and are VERY similar. Anyway, if anyone knows python or ruby please post here. And if you came here to yell and say it wont get done, dont bother posting..
